messages.value: Can't believe I'm stuck at first question... Do you have any ideas?
Not yet, but considering looking at hints. How to approach this problem?
Is the key to the answer in the letters? hmm
I was trying to list possible body parts in my head but I don't understand this
Hmm... Yeah. Eye don't think I know how to approach this...

questions.question: What five-letter word becomes shorter when you add two letters to it?
What time of day, when written in capital letters, is the same forwards, backwards and upside down?
What body part is pronounced as one letter but written with three, only two different letters are used?
What type of cheese is made backwards?
What begins with T, ends with T and has T in it?
Where do fish keep their money?
What goes up and down without moving?
What has a face and two hands but no arms or legs?
The more you have of it, the less you see. What is it?
What is that you will break everytime you name it?
When you have me, you feel like sharing me. But, if you do share me, you don't have me. What am I?
At night they come without being fetched. By day they are lost without being stolen. What are they?
What always runs but never walks, often murmurs, never talks, has a bed but never sleeps, has a mouth but never eats?
The one who makes it, sells it. The one who buys it, never uses it. The one that uses it never knows that he's using it. What is it?
I never was, am always to be. No one ever saw me, nor ever will. And yet I am the confidence of all, to live and breath on this terrestrial ball. What am I?

hints.value: Think about the letters literally.
The answer is sillier than you think...
Four letters
There aren't many possibilities to this. Think about it.
One can be an apple to this
Look closely and you'll see the correct answer
Think about it the silly way
You don't need help with this, the answer is right in the question
T
It literally took me some time to get this but it's literally the easiest

Most people don't like these
